intro.description: This cheat-sheet shows the steps required to create a new System Project (Tier 3).

item.title: Open the System Builder (Tier 3) perspective
item.description: The System project requires the System Builder (Tier 3) perspective to be opened (otherwise not all related commands will be visible).

item.title: Create a new System Project (Tier 3)
item.description: A new System Project (Tier 3) can be created using the respective wizard (follow the instructions in the wizard).

item.title: Specify System model elements
item.description: Here you should specify your component definition model.

item.title: Execute the Deployment Code Generation
item.description: Now run the code generator which in this case will generate deployment scripts and other deployment configuration files.

item.title: Deploy the system
item.description: Now execute the deployment action that will trigger generated shell scripts to send all the related system artefacts to the specified target platform and optionally execute the system remotely at the target.
